long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚û°Ô∏èAI SEO Assistant
Enhance your SEO strategies and blog content creation with ease using the most powerful AI SEO Assistant. This Chrome extension seamlessly integrates with Claude.ai and ChatGPT.com, providing you with powerful tools to optimize your SEO plans and generate high-quality blog posts directly within the platform. 

üéØThis SEO Assistant is your SEO buddy for Claude.ai and ChatGPT.com

‚û°Ô∏èKey Features
‚úÖSEO Strategy Generator: Input your target keyword and get a comprehensive SEO content strategy plan, including keyword clusters, long-tail keywords, search intents, and click-enticing titles and meta descriptions.
‚úÖBlog Post Creator: Easily generate SEO-optimized blog posts tailored to your specified tone, complete with optimized titles, engaging content, and essential SEO elements.
‚úÖOutrank Blog: Easily generate SEO-optimized blog based on a provided URL and selected tone. That's it! 
‚úÖUser-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive button integration for seamless interaction with input area.
‚úÖCustomizable Prompts: Modify keyword and blog settings to match your specific SEO needs and preferences.

‚û°Ô∏èHow It Works
Install the Extension: Add the AI SEO Assistant to your Chrome browser.
Pin the Extension: Make sure you PIN üìå the AI SEO Assistant to your Chrome browser.
Navigate to Claude.ai: Open Claude.ai or ChatGPTand start your SEO or blogging tasks.
üõëNote there is an intentional 2.7 second delay before buttons appearing, this is by design.
When active an ‚ñ∂Ô∏èicon wil appear in the AI input area to toggle the SEO buttons show/hide.
Use the Buttons: Click the 'SEO Strategy', 'SEO Blog', 'Outrank' buttons to open input dialogs.
Submit Your Inputs: Enter your target keywords or blog titles and customize settings.
Generate Content: Receive tailored SEO strategies or blog content directly in Claude.ai's or ChatGPT's input field, ready for further refinement and use.

‚û°Ô∏èWhy Choose AI SEO Assistant?
Efficiency: Streamline your SEO planning & blog creation processes saving time and effort.
Accuracy: Leverage detailed and accurate keyword information to boost your SEO performance.
Convenience: Direct integration with Claude.ai and ChatGPT.com means no switching between tools‚Äîeverything you need is in one place.

‚û°Ô∏èGet Started
Install the AI SEO Assistant today and take your SEO and content creation efforts to the next level. Whether you're a marketing professional, content creator, or business owner, this extension is designed to help you achieve better results with less hassle.
